titleStmt.title: John Boyle to William H. Randall
CWG13910

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Adjutant General Letter Book - No. 3 ; 9 April - 25 May 1864

body.p:
60
April 19th 4
Hon W. H. Randall
Washington, D.C.
Sir,
The only official information, we have of the death of Captain Edmond Jones 24th Ky vol Inf, will be found in extract of letter from Lt Col J. S. Hurt, viz:

Head Quarters 24th Ky vol Inf
Camp Keenon. January 19th 1863
Jno. W. Finnell
Adjt Gen of Ky

I respectfully recommend to his Excellency James F. Robinson Governor of the Commonwealth of Kentucky, Robert G Potter to be appointed & commissioned as Captain of company "H" of this regiment, to fill the vacancy occasioned by the decease of Capt Edmond Jones, who died in april or may 1862. x x x x x x x x

J. S. Hurt
Lt Col Comding 24th regt Ky Vols

Very respectfully
John Boyle
Adjt Gen of Ky
